description: DeveloperConsoleCatalogCategoryMeta are the key identifiers of a developer catalog category.

id.description: ID is an identifier used in the URL to enable deep linking in console. ID is required and must have 1-32 URL safe (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, - and _) characters.

label.description: label defines a category display label. It is required and must have 1-64 characters.

tags.description: tags is a list of strings that will match the category. A selected category show all items which has at least one overlapping tag between category and item.
